metadata.name: Google Workspace Role Modified or Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects when an a role is modified or deleted in Google Workspace.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM entity_management WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('admin.googleapis.com') AND (lower(LOWER(api.operation)) in ('delete_role', 'rename_role', 'update_role')))

output.summary: Detects when an a role is modified or deleted in Google Workspace.
